menu.title: Navbar
menu.body: The Bootcards Navbar is the main navigation system for desktop browsers.

menu.title: Sliding Sidebar
menu.body: The Sliding Sidebar offers complex apps more space navigation items.

menu.title: Footerbar
menu.body: The Footer Bar offers usable mobile navigation for simpler apps with a few important navigation items.

menu.title: Base Card
menu.body: Base Cards display a list of information separated by dividers.

menu.title: List Card
menu.body: Bootcards Lists are used to navigate the entities in your app (e.g. Contacts, Files, Messages, etc). Basic list view that binds to a ngModel attribute

menu.title: File Card
menu.body: File Cards are intended to show information and functions for non-media file formats (PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, etc).

menu.title: Form Card
menu.body: Form Cards are used for user input in your app.

properties.ngModel: The model for the form data

menu.title: Media Card
menu.body: Media Cards hold larger images or videos.

menu.title: Chart Card
menu.body: Chart cards contain charts powered by Morris.js.

menu.title: Summary Card
menu.body: Summary cards can be used on dashboards, etc to highlight important pieces of data in your app.
